title: Company News for Sep 5, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: Shares of Coupa Software Inc.   COUP    gained 8.7% after its fiscal Q2 2020 non-GAAP earnings of 7 cents   per share beat the Zacks Consensus Estimate of a loss of 10   cents. Shares of Michaels Companies Inc.   MIK    rose 11.8% after the company's Q2 earnings of $0.19 per share   outpaced the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.14. Shares of JetBlue Airways Corporation   JBLU    declined 4.5% after the airline slashed its unit revenue   outlook. Shares of Starbucks Corporation   SBUX    shed 0.7% after the coffee giant lowered its earnings-per-share   growth outlook for fiscal 2020.
